title: feat(spice): Add duration and timePerStep support to <analogsimulation />
description: Adds support for duration and timePerStep props to the analogsimulation  component, allowing customization of SPICE transient analysis parameters.
body:
…n />

This pull request adds support for duration and timePerStep props to the       
<analogsimulation /> component. This allows for customization of the SPICE     
transient analysis parameters.                                                 

 • <analogsimulation /> now accepts optional duration and timePerStep props.   
 • The SPICE simulation logic now uses these props to generate the .tran       
   directive. If not provided, it defaults to a 10ms duration and 1us time     
   step.                                                                       
 • A new test, spice-analysis04-rc-charging-voltage-divider-custom-time.test.tsx, has been added to verify that custom simulation times are correctly applied.

title: do not release the version bump version
description: Prevents the release of a version bump when the commit message starts with v.

title: feat(sim): Use voltage probe name as graph labelg
description: Updates simulation graph generation to use the name from a simulation_voltage_probe element as a fallback label for the corresponding simulation_transient_voltage_graph in the SVG legend.
body:
This PR updates the simulation graph generation to use the name from a simulation_voltage_probe element as a fallback label for the corresponding simulation_transient_voltage_graph in the SVG legend.                                                                       

If a transient voltage graph element has its own name property, that will take precedence. If it does not, but it is linked to a voltage probe via schematic_voltage_probe_id, the probe's name will be used.                                                                      

This allows for more descriptive and user-friendly graph labels that can be sourced directly from the circuit design.

title: feat: add tsconfig "paths" alias resolution (with tests)
description: Adds support for resolving non-relative imports using tsconfig.json paths, including wildcard and exact aliases, with extension fallback and tests included.
body:
• Resolve non-relative imports using tsconfig.json compilerOptions.baseUrl and     
   paths when provided in fsMap                                                     
 • Supports wildcard and exact aliases (e.g., @src/, @utils/) with extension        
   fallback (.ts, .tsx, .js, .jsx, .json, .obj, .gltf, .glb)                        
 • Works across runner and webworker; maps original alias to resolved module in     
   preSuppliedImports                                                               
 • Added test: tests/features/tsconfig-paths-resolution.test.tsx                    
 • No breaking changes; node_modules and static asset resolution remain unchanged   

Usage:                                                                              

 • Include a tsconfig.json in your fsMap: { "compilerOptions": { "baseUrl": ".",    
   "paths": { "@src/": ["src/"] } } }                                               
 • Then import via aliases (e.g., import Comp from "@src/component")  

/fixes https://github.com/tscircuit/eval/issues/1204
/claim https://github.com/tscircuit/eval/issues/1204

title: feat: Add support for simulation voltage probes
description: Adds support for simulation voltage probes, enabling the generation of .PRINT TRAN statements for SPICE simulations.
body:
This PR adds support for simulation_voltage_probe from circuit-json, enabling the generation of .PRINT TRAN statements for  SPICE simulations.     
                                                                                                     
 • Voltage Probe Handling: The circuitJsonToSpice function now processes simulation_voltage_probe elements. It identifies   
   the target nodes (via source_port_id or source_net_id) and generates .PRINT TRAN V(node) statements if a transient       
   analysis is defined.                                                                                                     
 • SPICE Netlist Updates: SpiceNetlist and its string conversion utility were updated to include the generated print        
   statements.                                                                                                              
 • Testing: A new test file (tests/unit/voltage-probe.test.ts) was created to verify the correct generation of .PRINT       
   statements for various scenarios, including probes on port IDs, net IDs, and ground.

title: chore: use `Bun.write` so tests don't fail when `debug-output` is missing
description: Replaces writeFileSync with await Bun.write(...) in the test suite to prevent test failures due to missing debug-output directory, and updates README accordingly.
body: ## Summary Previously, running `bun test` caused failures whenever the `debug-output` directory did not exist because tests used `writeFileSync` (which throws if the parent directory is missing). Developers had to manually create `debug-output` after cloning. This change replaces `writeFileSync` with `await Bun.write(...)` in the test suite and updates the README example to match. `Bun.write` automatically creates parent directories, so tests no longer fail due to a missing `debug-output` folder. Before : --- ## Why - `Bun.write` creates parent directories automatically, removing the need for manualy creating a pre-existing `debug-output` folder. --- ## How to Test Run locally (Bun required): ```bash # run full test suite bun test # or run a single test bun test test/basics/basics01/basics01.test.ts ``` Expected: tests no longer fail due to missing `debug-output` dir

title: feature: Allow long traces that don't cross any other traces
description: Adds functionality to allow long traces in schematic designs that do not intersect with existing traces, enhancing the routing capabilities of the schematic trace solver.

title: Refactor splitBoardAndChipProps usage and board components
description: Refactors the usage of splitBoardAndChipProps across components, enhancing prop handling in ArduinoShield and MicroModBoard, and fixes naming and typing issues for better consistency.
body:
Cleaned up how splitBoardAndChipProps is used across components and fixed a few naming and typing issues.

Reworked the prop handling in ArduinoShield to make it more flexible and avoid undefined destructuring.

Simplified splitBoardAndChipProps usage so it’s cleaner and less error-prone.

Updated chip naming to automatically append _chip for consistency.

title: Update chip name to include '_chip' suffix to stop "A component with the same name already exists" Error
description: Fixes error: Cannot create component micromod: A component with the same name already exists

title: feat: add GlobalLabel support
description: Adds support for GlobalLabel in KiCad schematic representation, allowing for enhanced labeling of signals across sheets.

title: feat: implement an infinite grid with fade-out feature
description: Adds an infinite grid rendering feature with a fade-out effect for improved visual representation in 3D scenes.

title: feat: Support .PRINT probes for transient analysis
description: Adds support for .PRINT TRAN statements to specify output probes for transient analysis, allowing users to filter output voltages based on specified probes.
body:
This pull request introduces support for .PRINT TRAN statements to specify output probes for transient analysis.                          

 • The netlist parser now recognizes .PRINT TRAN V(node1) V(node2) ... and stores the requested node names.                               
 • The transient analysis simulation filters the output voltages, returning only the probed nodes if a .PRINT statement is present.       
 • Added a test with a boost converter to verify single-probe functionality and generate a snapshot.                                      
 • Added a test with an RC circuit to verify multiple-probe functionality and generate a snapshot.

title: feat: Add Diode and Switch model support for TRAN analysis
description: Adds support for Diode (D) and Switch (SW) models in the SPICE simulator, enabling accurate transient analysis for these components.
body:
This PR enhances the SPICE simulator by adding support for Diode (D) and Switch (SW) models and implementing diode behavior in transient analysis.                                                                                                                                 

 • Diode and Switch .MODEL Parsing: The netlist parser now correctly handles .MODEL cards for diodes (D) and voltage-controlled switches (SW/vswitch), including their specific parameters.                                                                                     
 • Diode Transient Simulation: Diode components are now accurately simulated in transient (.tran) analysis. This is achieved by implementing a companion model based on the Shockley diode equation within the Newton-Raphson iteration loop.                          
 • New Test Case: A new test, tests/transient/diode-switch.test.ts, has been added to verify the functionality of both diode and switch models in a transient simulation.

title: support silkscreen which are independent and not part of the component
description: Adds support for standalone silkscreen text elements that are not associated with components in the PCB design.

title: feat: add the pcb_component rotation to it's element
description: Adds rotation functionality to PCB components, allowing for accurate placement and orientation in KiCad.

title: feat: add support for the pcb_hole conversion to the np_thru_hole
description: Adds support for converting non-plated holes (pcb_hole) to non-plated through holes (np_thru_hole) in the PCB generation process.

title: remove the default component being added and use fpText instead of grText for the footprint silkscreen
description: Removes the default component addition and replaces grText with fpText for footprint silkscreen elements in the PCB generation process.

title: feat: support `pcb_silkscreen_text` and fix the inverted smd pad positions
description: Adds support for PCB silkscreen text and corrects the positioning of SMD pads in the PCB layout.

title: feat: add support for conversion from pcb_plated_hole to thru hole in kicad
description: Adds support for converting pcb_plated_hole elements to through-hole pads in KiCad.

title: support netLabels converting to globalLabels for kicad_export
description: Converts net labels without a symbol name to KiCad global labels during the export process.

title: feat: add support for netlabels with symbols for gnd and pwr
description: Adds support for net labels with symbols for ground and power in schematic generation, allowing for better representation of these elements in the schematic.
body: will fix the position of the net labels text and the arrow flag around the netLabels in upcoming fixes
